sentences.en: A strong hand had to bring forth political altruism, whatever the tone of economics.

sentences.en: But he acknowledges it is not pure altruism.

sentences.en: He's seeking to remind people that self - interest, not just altruism, justifies engagement abroad.

sentences.en: The behavior under the microscope is altruism, which refers to concern for the well - being of others.

sentences.en: The bottom line, he said, is that altruism may rely on a basic understanding that others hae motiations and actions that may be similar to our own.

sentences.en: The second form is reciprocal altruism , or " you scratch my back and I'll scratch yours "

sentences.en: There is also fear that his altruism may be motivated by calculated gamesmanship.

sentences.en: We see it in the growing altruism of Trade Unionism.
